title: Karma Girl
description: Fed up because of her cheating superhero ex-fianc√©, intrepid reporter Carmen Cole has made her mission in life to reveal the true identities of the nation's caped crusaders and their archvillains, but her quest could land her in more trouble than even Striker, the sexiest superhero in Bigtime, New York, can get her out of. Original.
author: Jennifer Estep
